name: Nightfall (itch) (Dylan Opel)
description: This is my first complete video game and I appreciate ANYONE who chooses to play it! In this game you survive through the day by chopping down trees to get wood so you can build your base to defend against the zombies at night. This game is still in EARLY development and I'm very willing to be offered ideas and bugs! Thank you anyone who chooses to play this game, I hope you enjoy!
